text: Antonio Laxa (June 12, 1934 â€“ January 23, 2021) better known by his stage name Tony Ferrer, was a Filipino actor, movie director and producer. He was called the James Bond of the Philippines for his movie role as Tony Falcon in the Agent X-44 spy movie series. Ferrer was born in Macabebe, Pampanga. He also played Inspector Ramos in The Vengeance of Fu Manchu and Ben Guevara in Blind Rage.
